page.title: 04FARMING
page.content: Mr and Mrs Taylor own Wester Ochiltree farm.The farm is a fairly large one of 507 acres.Mr Taylor keeps livestock and grows crops as well.He grazes 153 acres,uses 254 acres for grain,127 acres for hay and silage and 60 acres for rape,which fattens 1200 lambs. Mr Taylor keeps 200 beef cattle in a flying herd,which means that he buys and sells but does not breed any stock.He sells his stock at an auction market in Stirling not in the slaughterhose in Linlithgow. Mr Taylor enjoys living on the farm and thinks the advantages are the peace and quiet.The disadvantages are not getting the public services that others have. Mr Taylor employs 2 farmhands to help him.The special feature on his farm is the Peace Knoll,which was an Iron Age Fort.
